title: Bootstrap Progress Bars
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Visualizing Completion
Provide up-to-date feedback on the progress of a workflow or action.

### Structure
1. `.progress`: Outer wrapper (gray background).
2. `.progress-bar`: Inner bar (colored, defines width).

### Styling
* `bg-*`: Colors.
* `.progress-bar-striped`: Stripes.
* `.progress-bar-animated`: Moving stripes.

examples.explanation: Width is controlled via inline CSS usually.

exam_notes: Multiple bars can stack in one container.
summary: Progress components are essential for long-running tasks.
